text: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion is a British stop motion animated children's television programme first broadcast on 2 May 2011, which is shown on CBeebies. It features a group of animal-based characters and their adventures and activities through the Jingly Jangly Jungle. The show is narrated by Lorraine Kelly and produced by Chapman Entertainment (series one and two) and DreamWorks Animation Television (series three and four). ==Characters== *Raa Raa (voiced by Bradley Shedden in series one and two, Tyler Coleman in series three): A fun-loving and noisy little lion. *Topsy (voiced by Eden Jarrett): A giraffe who loves to read and the tallest and oldest friend ever. She sometimes can be bossy, but it is only because she wants to help her friends as best as she can. *Zebby (voiced by Mia Hann): A kind and gentle zebra who sometimes gets hungry. *Hufty (voiced by Oliver Dillon): An elephant who loves music and giving his friends a ride on his train. *Ooo Ooo (voiced by Jamie Oram): A monkey who is fun and likes to swing on vines. *Crocky (voiced by Max Miller): A crocodile who likes to hang out by the river and ride in his log boat. *Pia (voiced by Hayden Hunter): A parrot who likes to fly high in the air. She debuted in series three. *Scuttle: A purple spider who has eight legs. She debuted in series three. *Stripy (voiced by Billy Jenkins): A striped orange tiger. He debuted in series four. *Slowly (voiced by Brian Cloppes): A green nicely turtle. who walks slow she debuted in series five. *Narrator (voiced by unknown) ==Episodes== ===Series overview=== ===Pilot (2009)=== #
